Title: Property Expression
HomeWiki:
Property Expression is a set of independent projects.

Projects

Controllable Query

  • First aspect of control: Native SQL.
  • Second aspect of control: Static Checking.
  • Third aspect of control: Full Dynamics of query code by string concatenation.
more

Reactive Relation

Reactive Relation implements dataflow principles for relational data structure and for C# language.
See Documentation: English, Russian.
Status: released.

Relational Data Instance

An infrastructure for working with instances of relational data. The project moved from Smart Client Platform.
See Documentation: Russian.
Status: prototyping.

Typed Query Builder

Typed Query Builder implements strongly typed Builder pattern for SQL and dynamic LINQ queries. Links.
Status: thinking of way of implementation and start of prototyping for SQL.

TypedDataBinding.Web

TypedDataBinding.Web implements infrastructure for strongly typed data binding for ASP.NET.
Status: the prototype is implemented.

TypedDataBinding.Wpf

TypedDataBinding.Wpf implements infrastructure for strongly typed data binding for WPF.
Status: thinking of way of implementation and start of prototyping.

Presentation Code

The project purpose is to describe WPF elements by means of C# language without XAML.
Status: prototyping.
